duties_responsibilities.duty: Process financial transactions promptly and accurately, strictly adhering to all bank policies and procedures.
Prioritize client demands and provide impeccable customer service.
Communicate professionally with all clients and colleagues, uphold understanding of all banking products and services.
Participate in job-specific training, various bank training programs, and comply with BSA, AML, and all bank policies and procedures.
Actively participate in the Customer Service First program and support the values of the organization.
Maintain a high level of confidentiality, demonstrate computer proficiency, and possess impeccable written and oral communication skills.
Work in a fast-paced environment, handle frequent interruptions, and work with little to no supervision.
Stand for most of the workday, lift, carry, or move heavy boxes or bags of currency and coin weighing up to 60 pounds.
Work flexible hours and/or extended hours as business requires.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED. Bachelor’s Degree is preferred, along with 6 months previous teller experience within the financial institution industry or 6 months previous cash handling experience in a retail customer service environment.
